Key Match Events: Dawid Malan scored 140 runs off 107 balls
Jonny Bairstow scored 52 runs off 59 balls
Joe Root scored 82 runs off 68 balls
Shoriful Islam took 3 wickets for 75 runs
Mahedi Hasan took 4 wickets for 71 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: England scored 364 for 9 in the match
Bangladesh bowlers could not repeat their impressive show against Afghanistan
Others: The match was played in Dharamshala
Dawid Malan's sequence of score in last four ODI innings is 96, 127, 14 and 140
Most of the boundaries came through the off-side
Malan's innings had 16 fours and five sixes
Bangladesh's worries didn't end as Root also played with a lot of positive intent
England possibly missed out on 40 runs more although it seems like a winning total
